author: PlayStation
description:
🎲 The dice have been cast. 🎲
A new fantasy adventure begins for your favorite Nickelodeon heroes.

Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny is a vibrant, universe-spanning mashup that brings iconic Nickelodeon heroes into a world of fantasy-style tropes and real-time RPG action. Roll the dice and dive into a wild, action-packed adventure with SpongeBob and more Nickelodeon characters! Get ready for epic battles, dynamic environments, and recognizable character moments, all with an engaging gameplay experience for players of all ages.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny - Official Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
hit rewind ⏪ press play ▶ 

Mixtape is coming soon on PlayStation®5.

On their last night together, three friends embark on one final adventure. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly curated playlist draws three friends into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. Players will immerse themselves in the teenage wasteland by playing through a mixtape of joyful gameplay, from skateboarding and flying to taking photos after hours at an abandoned theme park, hitting baseballs, and putting on a fireworks show from the backseat of a car. It's the greatest hits of the teenage experience, from the first kiss to the last dance.

Featuring music from DEVO, Roxy Music, Lush, The Smashing Pumpkins, Iggy Pop, Siouxsie and the Banshees, Joy Division, the Cure and many more.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Mixtape - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EB1674-PPSA28209_00-MINDSEYESTANDARD/

Build A Rocket Boy and IO Interactive Unveil Explosive MindsEye Trailer at Summer Game Fest, Teasing Agent 47’s Arrival in Post-Launch Hitman Collaboration.

At Summer Game Fest, Build A Rocket Boy and IO Interactive dropped a thrilling new trailer for MindsEye, showcasing heart-pounding combat, a gripping near-future world, and the emotional journey of protagonist Jacob Diaz. The trailer culminated in a jaw-dropping reveal: the legendary Agent 47 from IO Interactive’s Hitman franchise will join MindsEye as a playable character in a post-launch MindsEye x Hitman collaboration mission, set to launch in July 2025.

This highly anticipated MindsEye x Hitman mission will be crafted using Build A Rocket Boy’s revolutionary Game Creation System, a powerful and intuitive system empowering players and crafters alike to design custom games, weave new narratives, and create entirely original experiences. This collabora
title: MindsEye - Official Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012545

She-Hulk and Rocket Raccoon join the cosmic battle!
Play MARVEL Cosmic Invasion later this year on PS5® and PS4®

After Annihilus has launched an unprecedented attack across the galaxy, all life hangs in the balance…
To face this threat, She-Hulk forgoes litigation and takes matters into her own hands; get ready to grapple and toss enemies around with her gamma-powered might!
And if you’re more into firepower, blast your way through a barrage of bugs with Rocket Raccoon and his hard-hitting futuristic arsenal! With his penchant for sporadically lobbing grenades, you’re looking at MARVEL Cosmic Invasion’s most chaotic fighter yet.

She-Hulk and Rocket Raccoon join Captain America, Wolverine, Spider-Man, Storm, Phyla-Vell, Venom, and Nova as part of an out-of-this-world roster inspired by classic MARVEL comic books!
Get ready to brawl through the streets of Marvel’s New York all the way to the depths of the Negative Zone to foil Annihilus’
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - She-Hulk & Rocket Raccoon Reveal | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:
Two friends. One dream. LEGO® Voyagers, a vibrant co-op adventure, is coming to PS5® and PS4® later this year. Cooperatively solve challenges and discover how two bricks are better than one. Play locally on the same screen or online with Friend's Pass, allowing friends to play together using only one purchased copy of the game.

author: PlayStation
description:
📌 Pre-register now: https://7origin.netmarble.com/
👉 Add to your PS5 wishlist: https://store.playstation.com/ko-kr/concept/10014720

🌍 An epic adventure begins in the vast world of Britannia!

The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin is an open-world RPG that reimagines the world of the hit anime series The Seven Deadly Sins.
Explore a warped Britannia where time and space collide, and experience a brand-new story featuring both familiar characters and original heroes.
Dynamic combat and seamless exploration await you in this true anime adventure brought to life.

🎮 Console version launches exclusively on PlayStation®5!
Experience the vast world of Britannia like never before with the power of PS5,
where thrilling battles and emotional storytelling unfold before your eyes.

※ The console version will launch exclusively on PS5.
PC and mobile versions will be available on separate platforms.

#7DSOrigin #TheSevenDeadlySinsOrigin #PS5 #ConsoleExclusive #OpenWorldRPG #7DSO
#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin - Summer Game Fest 2025 Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
To betray one, is to betray all. Get a first look at the Torrisi Family business in the official story trailer for Mafia: The Old Country.

MAFIA: THE OLD COUNTRY launches August 8, 2025 for PlayStation®5.

Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily.

Fight to survive as Enzo Favara and prove your worth to the Family in this immersive third-person action-adventure.

#ps5 #ps5games #MafiaTheOldCountry #SummerGameFest
title: Mafia: The Old Country - “Loyalty is Everything” Story Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
In Path of Exile: Secrets of the Atlas, tears have begun to appear in the Atlas leading to different realities. The Originator of these realities has entangled themselves within the very fabric of the Atlas and they’re now trapped! Track down the source of the tears and uncover the secrets within.

Our new expansion introduces an additive endgame storyline, a new type of endgame item influence, three new endgame bosses, a new challenge league, dozens of new unique items and much more.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Path of Exile: Secrets of the Atlas - Official Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Madden 26 launches on August 14. Pre-order to play 3 days early.
So real it’s unreal. Madden 26 leverages a new AI-powered machine learning system trained on thousands of plays from nearly a decade of real NFL data to deliver more explosive gameplay—with new player-specific traits, authentic play-styles, and adaptive counters that match on-field tendencies and strategies of NFL quarterbacks and coaches.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Madden 26 - Official Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games
